summary: Brainfuck is minimalistic with 8 commands; Plankalk端l is the first high-level language from 1940s.
details: Brainfuck uses array manipulation with commands > < + - . , [ ] for pointer movement, increment, output, input, loops [web:7][web:10]. Plankalk端l by Konrad Zuse featured arrays, conditionals, first high-level concepts [web:18]. HyperCode resurrects such creative power for neurodivergent use.
